October 4, i960
TORONTO
Dear Harold,
I hope we shall hear no more concerning 11 affaire
Nusbaum. Just a query concerning the ’’Thinking
Through Language” booklets, copies of which I have
had made to insert in the Project 69 report. As •
soon as I had learnt that 100 or more copies of
the Report were to be made available, I had the
University Press make up a batch by offset.(300)They
are here in my office. Please tell me how many
of them are needed to insert in the Report. The
pamphlet is indispensable to understanding the
media experiemtns we carried out here.
3est wishes.
